c74object.name: notify
c74object.digest: Dumps a dictionary of track data into lists
c74object.description: The `notify` object reads from a named dictionary and outputs its content as a series of lists. It is designed to work with the track/bar/palette/offset structure used in this project.

inlet.description: - bang: Dumps all notes in the dictionary, sorted solely by absolute timestamp. - fill: Performs a specialized dump that synthesizes notes to match the reach of the longest track, sorted solely by absolute timestamp.

outlet.description: Outputs batch initialization messages: [palette, track, bar_ts, 0.0].
If the log attribute is enabled, this outlet provides status messages.

objarg.name: dictionary-name
objarg.digest: Name of the dictionary to read from

method.name: bang
method.description: Dumps all note data sorted solely by absolute timestamp.

method.name: fill
method.description: Dumps data while filling gaps to match global song reach, sorted solely by absolute timestamp.

attribute.name: log
attribute.description: When enabled (1), creates an additional outlet for status information.
